评论概述: Love these so much I ordered another color
评论详情: These fit well (true to size) and are of a good weight. Others I've ordered are super thin, but these look and feel very nice and when paired with a dressy top/blazer/sweater, looks very elegant. Highly recommend!

Get the pants!! I got the red and black to choose and I will NOT be returning either... I got a Medium they are a perfect fit, they have some stretch to them and I am short and chunky 5ft about 165... lots of jiggle in these legs so I thought they would not be flattering but I was dead wrong! Cant wait to wear them to my holiday party and then dress them down with some cute sneakers after ! Yay me :)

Nice light satin pants with a sporty look. Can dress them up with heels or down with sandals. The tie cords on the elastic waist are not really needed if you get the proper size. It makes it look a little too “inexpensive”. If you must use the cord, just tuck it in so it’s not too exposed. Otherwise, nice versatile pants.
Fits true to size. Great fabric quality, the material and material thickness are excellent. Light weight and comfortable. Worth the purchase.
I have these in several colors and love them all.  Great Fit and wash up beautiful.  For Reference I am 5’3” and weigh 141 lbs and bought this in a size Medium.
I received so many compliments on my pants.  I love them.
Perfect

Nothing disgusts me more than finding a product with the label “may cause cancer”.  I should’ve returned but I threw them in the trash can.  Very thick material, felt weird compared to other satin pants I have bought.  Cute design but it’s not worth risking getting sick over.
These pants are super cute. Love the material very comfy. The pink color is beautiful.

These pants could be the replacement for jeans.  So comfortable, classy, and  easy to care for.  I would love to see a jacket in same color and fabric .  I got size small in deep green.  I am 5’2” and weigh 138.

评论概述: The pants are really satin and soft
评论详情: I like that the pants are satin and soft, easily washable in cold water.  I was afraid there would be streaks after washing, but happily, no streaks.  The fit is perfect.  I am slim and purchased size small.  Coloring is almost silver which is what I wanted.  These pants can be worn with heels with nice blouse as dress-up or with sneakers and tee as dress-down.The only problem I had was that the delivery was a day later than originally stated.  I bought these pants for a special occasion and needed right away.  Since they did not arrive until a day later than I was expecting to receive them, I was afraid I would have to wear some pants from my closet.  But luckily they were delivered approximately an hour before I needed to leave for the event.  Thank goodness!  All I needed to do was use a warm iron to get rid of the wrinkles and they looked great.

I got so many compliments on these joggers in purple silky material. I wore them to Mardi Gras but would not hesitate to wear again, they were that flattering and comfortable.  True to size. Not too baggy and great length for me.

Absolutely amazing and true to size!

I love these pants I get a lot of compliments on them and they’re very bright! I ordered a large before according to my size (usually wearing size 8 in pants, I’m 5’2, waist 33) but found it was too big and long. I sized down and it was perfect.
If you put correct measurements in it is perfect to size. Thank you and plan on buying other colors

If you wear these to work, a night on the town, or just to the grocery store. Be. Prepared. To get compliments on compliments for basically wearing shiny pj bottoms. They are so comfy. So stylish. And I will be ordering in every color. I run pretty hot normally, so if you get hot flashes be prepared to get a lil sweaty too. But other than, these pants will steal the show.

Love these satin joggers. I wanted some thing affordable to try , to dress up with a crop top and heels, and even a blazer. They are super comfortable? easy to launder and fit great.
These are so cute. They're comfy and well fitting. I ordered a large at first BUT I've lost 26lbs and they were WAY too big(I'm 5'3" 141 lbs) so I got the medium and they fit absolutely perfect.

The pants are super cute. The material is thick enough of not show cellulite. There is a strange odor. I’ve washed twice. The second time I used Glamorous Wash, Diva scented & it seems to have helped.

Perfect and just what I needed to complete my outfit. I will definitely be purchasing more. I love the detail of the jawstring in the front as well. These pants can upstage any outfit.

Excellent

评论概述: Cute pants and true to size
评论详情: I ordered these pants to wear for my birthday brunch.  I am 5’6 and 190 with big butt/hips/thighs and I ordered an XL.  Unfortunately the XL was too big and I had to return them.  I got the hot pink and they were as pictured as far as the color and they were decent quality.  I tried to wash them and dry them to shrink them to fit me and was sad to see that the tassel drawstrings weren’t very good quality so they got destroyed in the dryer.

I bought these thinking they would be super cute with a pair of heels just like the photo example, but when i put them on, they just made me look huge. Not very flattering for me and I am 5'3" , 150lbs. I am so sad they didn't look good and I bought during the holidays so I got much too busy to return them. I will try and sell them elsewhere because I won't be wearing them.

评论概述: Very nice pants true to size
评论详情: Flattering and comfortable
These are amazing!! So flattering. I'm 5'9 168 and the medium fit me soooo good! I ordered the pink and the green. Love!
The material is nice quality and doesn’t look cheap. The pants were true to size and comfortable. I would buy the pants again! You should get them!

These are very comfortable and flattering pants.  They look very dressy to wear to work.  I saw that some reviews said they could dress them down which I guess you could with some cute tennis shoes and the right shirt.  They are not see-thru at all.  These are not stretchable fabric.  They are satin-like with a stretch waist band.  They do have a drawstring that you can tie off to make the waist tighter.  I bought black.

评论概述: Beautiful pants, not for short women
评论详情: These pants are amazing. They look great. I am 5’4” and had to fold the waist band over to make them fit properly. They have a cute tassel tie on the front, but folded they just look dumb. I don’t have a big behind. They would have been perfect if the waist band was 1-2 inches shorter. They would fit a taller woman perfect, or someone with a larger behind. They have a lot of room in the crotch. I’m sending them back - they’re not for a short/petite person. I ordered the medium.

These are the best joggers I’ve ever bought. Not sure if just the fabric or the cut but they’re so flattering! Usually joggers are either too baggy or too tight and are always too long on me. For reference I’m 5’3” and around 175 lbs (curvy athletic build) and the L fit perfect. The length hit exactly at my ankle and they look so good on.

评论概述: Great Pants!!  Beautiful material, O got so many compliments!
评论详情: I ordered a medium, they fit perfect. I wire to an Xmas party with a black dressy tank top and long red cardigan with red satin shoes. Super cute! Sorry no pics

These pants were very comfy. I bought my size but they were still too baggy in the crotch area. If I were to size down, they would not be long enough. I bought a cute pair that were similar to this at Old Navy. They fit better and they are cargo. I’ll use these for quick errands or around the house wear.

They really look fantastic and nice quality; maybe a size smaller will fit me better because I am a petit. I wore them in a cruise for  dress-up. They really look like fine clothing. I did  Washer/dryer and they came perfect!!!! Getting more colors. Really trending and fashionable. With high heels is a great combination; or with low dressy sandals; booties and also a fashion rhinestones sneakers!
The gold I ordered was more of a brown gold. Fabric not very shiny so it actually didn’t look good. Fabric was also very heavy and hot.

I bought these in black first and loved them so much I wanted to try this color. Mine are very wearable and opaque. They are really comfortable and easy to style. I have worn them with open toe heel sandals, flat sandals, heels with straps around the ankle and pumps. Living in Florida I haven't tried them with boots yet but I probably will at some point.  I want to get them in brown next. I sized up but it wasn't necessary. I hope you love them as much as I do.

When I say I'm obsessed with these I'm not kidding. I wore them around all summer. Wore then with heels, flats and sneakers and they looked amazing with each shoe. I'm 5'4 about 110lbs and I got an XS and they fit perfectly. Just enough length to get to my ankle, but still show off my shoes. I and buying these in every color. You can dress them up or down. I paired them with crop tops and bodysuits and it adds the perfect touch of class when you wanna dress up or when you want to dress down, but still want to look polished and effortless. You need these!

Loved the joggers and wished they had worked for me but I want a slimmer leg jogger, which is hard to find.  Sizing down could have helped.  I did have to roll the waist down to get a good fit in the bum but that is normal for me.The fabric was nice and would have kept if it was the fit I was looking for.  I work in retail and we have similar pants for $500 and I would have worn these to work to show how to style the ones we sell and most would have not known the difference between these and the ones we sell!

评论概述: Uncomfortable fabric! Like wearing a cheap couch cover on your legs

What on EARTH pants did you get, that I did not?  The pants I got were like wearing a burlap sack, with glossy sealant on the outside. I could not take them off fast enough to return to UPS. The feeling of that rough and creepy fabric on my legs will give me nightmares tonight.
Love the feel and the fit. Size 9/10 and the medium was perfect.
Super fits perfect
Was just not a flattering fit on me.  Beautiful color & fabric.

I wish I would have ordered my usual size, but the reviews said if you have thick thighs to go up a size. I'm 32-24-38 and weigh about 120 and I should have gotten an xs. Comfy fit. Gave three stars for the elastic. Not a fan.
Very comfortable and classy looking

These are so beautiful in person and looks so flattering. Very comfy and I love the pockets! I've worn these to a nice steak dinner and definitely got the compliments. They're so cozy n look so put together with some heels on. Quality is definitely there. The look n feel. Luxurious!
Great fit, comfortable snd sexy. I wore with a body suit and heels and got so many compliments!

These little gems are true to size, comfortable, made well, and soooo cute. I wore them with a black satin blouse I also bought on Amazon, tucked it in and it looked like the cutest jumpsuit. Love it. Wore it with heels and went dancing, then wore it with sandals and just so so cute!
Really cute pants but they run very big, even for someone like me with big hips/butt. Soft and versatile though!
I like them, but they’re thicker than I expected. I was hoping for more of a flouncy feel and these are just a little thicker with more structure.
Fits perfectly and looks great with heels! love the heavy, slick material!
I’ve ordered 3 Pair. They are beautiful. I don’t know how they will wash, but I’m hoping for the best.

评论概述: LOVE! Perfect jogger, dressed up or down
评论详情: I love these pants! They are stylish yet SO comfortable, high rise, don’t wrinkle easily, and can be dressed up or down. I typically wear size small in workout tights and pants (5’7”, 130 lbs) and purchased small. The waist and length fit are perfect with a looser fit all around.
The pant look nice but still to big for me with size xs and I’m 5’4 weight 110
These pants are a nice thick material and fit perfectly! I was surprised the quality was so good and I received so many compliments. Don’t pass these up!

I ordered a large, I’m a size 10 in jeans. If you pull the pants all the way up, the hip area of the pants are snug and there is a ton of material at the top…similar to mom jeans. They look hilarious on. If they took two inches off the waist area and loosened the hip area these would be cute. I’m going to take them to a seamstress and see if she can fix them.  I feel if I ordered a medium the through area would have been really tight but the top might be less bulky. I don’t know, they are just odd pants.
They run a little big I usually order a medium but I had to return and get a small. Really nice quality
I am 5'2" and weigh 134 lbs. and the Medium is a little large.  I should have bought a small but i love the look and feel of the pants.  I bought 3 colors.

Great pants! I can dress these up or down. There’s a little give to the material. I am usually inbetween sizes but I went with a medium here and you can see they’re still a little big. If I wash it I’m not worried about them shrinking. Nice thin satin material. Definitely would consider getting another pair.

Nice but long. I’m on the short side (5’ 4”) and they are a little too long on me. They are a decent quality and nice material, but would look much nicer on a taller frame-which can be said for most clothes.

评论概述: Love but beware the lighter colors!!
评论详情: I bought in black and khaki for work and the black are PERFECT! I sized up as I have wide hips and the drawstring keeps the waist from gapping. The khaki fit a little smaller which is fine… but they show EVERY panty line and dimple, and it’s too hot where I live for spandex underneath. Exchanging for another dark color.
They fit well with the drawstring. Be careful not to spill anything on them. Nice material didn’t feel cheap.

I love these pants! They look classy enough to wear to work, and the fabric is much better quality than typical Amazon clothes (like this white shirt that I will be returning.) I am self conscious of my tummy - these pants hide that and cinch right at your natural waist for a very flattering fit. True to size. Cute to wear with flats or heels. I recommend!
Returned these pants. Look I get it, I’m short and thin but these size small pants looked like I was wearing a trash bag on each leg. Maybe they would look good on someone much taller.
I bought these a while back. They are nice quality, but I should have sized up due to my big thighs. They are a little restrictive and I no longer have the packaging to send back.
